articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Sessions with Builders
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Builders
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the builders of the Construction Bureau 8 who performed labor feats in successfully building monumental edifices in the era of Songun.
					 When he appeared at the photographing venue, the builders enthusiastically welcomed him, extending their boundless greetings to him.
					
					 Acknowledging the enthusiastic cheers of the builders, he extended his warm greetings to them.
					
					 He highly praised the builders of the Construction Bureau 8 as the heroes in the era of Songun and treasures of our party as they are devoting themselves to translating the party's plan for construction into reality, and had a photo session with them.
					
					 After the photographing, he warmly waved his hands to the builders with the smile on his face.
					
					 He said that when innovations are made in construction, the foundation for building a thriving nation will be firmly laid, the cradle for the people's happiness provided and our people will more deeply cherish the great pride, revolutionary self-esteem and patriotism, seeing the looks of the country changing day by day.
					
					 The new speed of construction and the spirit of the era being created at grand construction sites are powerfully encouraging all service personnel and people to the heroic struggle and feats for building a thriving nation, he said, expressing expectation and belief that the builders of the Construction Bureau 8 would successfully discharge their responsibility and role in the projects they assume in the future, too.
					
					 Participating in the photographing were Han Kwang Sang, department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, and Kim Yong Su and Ri Mun Gon, vice department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: WPK Central Committee and Central Military Commission Publish Joint Slogans
articles.content:
WPK Central Committee and Central Military Commission Publish Joint Slogans
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea published the following joint slogans on Feb. 11 on the occasion of the 70th anniversaries of the liberation of the country and the founding of the WPK:
					On the road of grandiose advance for ushering in a new era of the Juche revolution under the leadership of the great Workers' Party of Korea, our service personnel and people will be greeting the 70th anniversaries of the liberation of the country and the founding of the Party. 
					
					That the great Comrade Kim Il Sung, the peerless patriot and the sun of the nation, liberated the country by fighting a 20-year-long bloody anti-Japanese war and accomplished the cause of founding the Party was a historic event, which brought about a radical turn in carving out the destiny of our country and people. 
					
					As there were significant August 15 and October 10 of the year Juche 34 (1945), our people could free themselves from the accursed yoke of colonial slavery and have a true guiding force that could lead them in carving out their destiny, and the history of a genuine people's country, Juche Korea, which would prosper endlessly under the Party's leadership, started. 
					
					The 70-year-long history of our Party and country is the history of great victories, the history of glorious inheritance, in which they have brought about epoch-making, miraculous transformations under the leadership of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu. 
					
					In this long period the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il held aloft the banner of the Juche idea and the Songun idea and led our revolution along the road resplendent with victories, thus performing imperishable exploits that will shine in the history of the country. 
					
					Their leadership was the basic source of the brilliant victory that was achieved in the grim Fatherland Liberation War against the US imperialists and of the revolutionary spirit of Paektu and the spirit of sure victory that soared high century after century; it was also the decisive factor of the heroic feats and uninterrupted miracles that were achieved in the two rounds of reconstruction, two stages of social revolution, unprecedented struggle to defend the country and construction of a thriving socialist country. 
					
					As they were led by the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, our Party could shine its brilliance as the powerful political General Staff, as a Juche-type revolutionary party, that led the revolution and construction victoriously over the past seven decades without any error in or deviation from its lines, our country could develop into a politico-ideological and military giant possessed with an unbreakable single-hearted unity and matchless military capability, and our people could demonstrate the dignity of a heroic people who make ceaseless innovations and advance while courageously braving all manner of hardships of history with indomitable spiritual strength and inexhaustible creative power. 
					
					Immortal will be the revolutionary exploits of the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who, with outstanding ideas and theories, gigantic revolutionary practice and ennobling patriotic devotion, ushered in an era of prosperity that had never been witnessed in the nation's history spanning 5 000 years, raised the dignity and position of our Party, our country and our people to the highest level possible and laid an eternal foundation that guarantees the victorious advance and future of our revolution. 
					
					The ever-victorious history and tradition of our revolution is now being carried forward without interruption by Comrade Kim Jong Un, another great man of the type of Mt Paektu. 
					
					As he is leading us wisely, the sacred history of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea continues invariably, all the service personnel and people have been rallied more firmly as single-heartedly united ranks who share the ideas, intentions and destiny with the Party, and our country is shining its brilliance as the powerful Paektusan nation which is advancing vigorously towards a bright future on the strength of ideology, arms and science and technology. 
					
					Looking back with deep emotion over the past 70 years of our Party and country, our service personnel and people keenly feel boundless dignity and self-respect of having carried forward the tradition of victory under the leadership of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu and are filled with burning determination to accomplish without fail the great, sacred cause of Paektu under the leadership of the great Comrade Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Today's general offensive towards the 70th anniversaries of national liberation and Party founding is a worthwhile struggle to translate our people's dreams and ideals into reality by dint of the revolutionary faith, revolutionary mettle and revolutionary courage created on Mt Paektu; it is also a grand all-people march to resolutely frustrate all sorts of challenges by hostile forces by dint of the attacking spirit of Paektu and to sing loudly the song of victory on all fronts of building a thriving socialist country. 
					
					As there are priceless revolutionary exploits the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed while blazing the trail of the Juche revolution and Songun revolution and the outstanding and seasoned leadership of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un who carries forward the proud tradition of victory, we will always emerge victorious. 
					
					Calling on all Party members, officers and men of the People's Army and people to wage a persevering struggle in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu, as befit the descendants of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung and the soldiers and followers of the great Comrade Kim Jong Il and thus glorify this significant year as a year of great victory, as a year of revolutionary, auspicious events that would be noteworthy in the country's history, the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea jointly publish slogans on the occasion of the 70th anniversaries of national liberation and Party founding. 
					
					Let us all turn out in the general offensive to hasten final victory in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu!
					
					Let us greet the 70th anniversaries of national liberation and Party founding with high political enthusiasm and brilliant labour feats!
					
					Let us glorify the 70th anniversaries of national liberation and Party founding as revolutionary, auspicious events noteworthy in the history of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea!

					Let us uphold the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as the eternal leaders of our Party and people and as the sun of Juche!
					
					The great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will always be with us! 
					
					Let us glorify the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun eternally as the supreme sanctuary of Juche, as a grand monument to the immortality of the leaders!

articles.title: DPRK Measure Council for Human Rights in South Korea Demands Abolition of SL
articles.content:
DPRK Measure Council for Human Rights in South Korea Demands Abolition of SL
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Measure Council for Human Rights in South Korea released a statement Thursday in connection with the fact that the south Korean puppet group has become all the more desperate in their moves to retrogressively revise the "Security Law" and stamp out progressive and democratic forces in a bid to maintain power through fascist suppression as they find themselves in the worst ruling crisis.
					 The SL fabricated by traitor Syngman Rhee has earned an ill fame as a murderous repressive means that served the successive ruling quarters in their moves to stamp out political dissidents and keep ruling system, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The SL has become a pronoun of horror today the mere mention of which makes the south Korean people tremble with fear.
					
					 It is the worst fascist and unprecedented evil law violating human rights.
					
					 The fascist repressive racket kicked up by the south Korean puppet forces has turned south Korea into a land where human rights are seriously abused.
					
					 This notwithstanding, the present puppet forces keen to retrogressively revise the SL are the worst human rights abusers and fascist dictators far surpassing "yusin" fascist junta.
					
					 It is the height of impudence for them to talk about someone's "human rights" whenever they open their mouths.
					
					 The SL has to be abolished at once as it turned south Korea into the world's worst tundra of human rights and stands in the way of achieving national reconciliation, unity and reunification. 
					
					 The statement called on human conscience and unbiased opinion of the international community to raise just voices demanding the abolition of the SL.

articles.title: Oath-taking Meeting Held at Paektusan Secret Camp
articles.content:
Oath-taking Meeting Held at Paektusan Secret Camp
 Samjiyon, February 12 (KCNA) -- An oath-taking meeting took place at the Paektusan Secret Camp on Feb. 12 to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, holding leader Kim Jong Il as the sun of Juche, on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (his birth anniversary).
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, Hyon Yong Chol, Kwak Pom Gi, Vice Premiers Kim Yong Jin and Ri Chol Man, officials of the party and armed forces bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, persons of merit, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and other people. 
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, in a speech expressed the will to unconditionally and devotedly implement to the letter the idea and behests of Kim Jong Il without an inch of deflection and without a step of concession, holding him in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 He also reiterated the will to carry forward to the last the history of comradeship, the history of single-minded unity which started in Mt. Paektu, absolutely trusting and following Kim Jong Un, the destiny of the country and banner of eternal victory, with the revolutionary faith to be cherished till one may die. 
					
					 Army General Hyon Yong Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, said that the KPA would hold Kim Jong Il as the sun of Songun of Juche forever in high esteem and firmly defend and glorify for all ages the undying feats he performed in army building, regarding his birthplace at the Paektusan Secret Camp as a spiritual mainstay at all times.
					
					 The KPA equipped with the arms of revolution given by the party and the country and the arms provided by the working class will wipe out the enemies like the blizzards of Mt. Paektu once an order is issued and thus lead the fireworks displayed in the sky above Jong Il Peak to the fireworks celebrating the final victory of the Kim Jong Un's powerful Paektusan nation, he noted.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said that the youth will eternally glorify the noble revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il, the great image of the powerful Paektusan nation, holding him as the eternal leader in high esteem, as befitting the successors to the revolutionary cause of Juche which started in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Then fireworks were displayed in the sky above the holy land of revolution.
					
					 The hearts of the participants looking up to endless display of fireworks were filled with the revolutionary enthusiasm to remain loyal to the revolutionary cause of Juche with the revolutionary faith pulsating with the breath of Mt. Paektu and deeply rooted like the ranges of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Reception Given by Syrian Charge d'Affaires AD Interim
articles.content:
Reception Given by Syrian Charge d'Affaires AD Interim
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Tammam Sulaiman, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Syrian embassy here, gave a reception at his embassy on Thursday in celebration of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Invited to the reception were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong, Minister of External Economic Relations Ri Ryong Nam, and other officials concerned.
					
					 Tammam Sulaiman in a speech praised Kim Jong Il for putting the national dignity and power on the highest level by wisely leading the socialist construction and the movement for the national reunification.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il had close relations with HE Hafez Al-Assad and President Bashar Al-Assad true to the will of eternal President Kim Il Sung and further developed friendship between the two countries.
					
					 Syria and DPRK, being convinced of their just causes, have adhered to the independent stand and strengthened the cooperation and mutual support for common interests in the international arenas.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop said Kim Jong Il represents the eternal image of the DPRK, Juche-based country and great Paektusan nation, and the sun in the era of independence admired by the progressives.
					
					 He noted:
					
					 The idea and cause of Kim Jong Il are being reliably carried forward thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean people will as ever send invariable support and solidarity to the just struggle of the Syrian people with the belief that the Syrian government and people will surely succeed in the struggle for achieving national sovereignty and territorial integrity and building a prosperous country.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets New Czech Ambassador

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un

articles.title: Officials in Charge of Cultural and Friendly Relations of Foreign Embassies Visit Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition

Officials in Charge of Cultural and Friendly Relations of Foreign Embassies Visit Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here visited the Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition on Thursday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits International Friendship Exhibition House
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits International Friendship Exhibition House
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the International Friendship Exhibition House on Thursday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Ice Sculpture Festival Held in Mt. Paektu Area
articles.content:
Ice Sculpture Festival Held in Mt. Paektu Area 
 Samjiyon, February 12 (KCNA) -- The ice sculpture festival celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il is being held with splendor in Samjiyon County, Ryanggang Province from Feb. 5. 
					 Soldiers of the division of the Ministry of People's Security of the Construction Shock Brigade 618 presented more than 1 000 ice sculptures to the festival. 
					
					 The festival has five themes including "Great Life of Fatherly General" and "Our National Heritage Protected by Fatherly General and Glorified by Respected Marshal". Peculiar and colorful ice sculptures present fantastic and mysterious sceneries. 
					
					 Seen in the center of the festival venue is a large ice sculpture "Ardent Wishes." It depicts Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp and Jong Il Peak accompanying with the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il. It impressively deals with the noble loyalty of the Korean people to him. 
					
					 There are such ice sculptures as "Let's fight for the sake of our country and people even if we may die or live", "Declaration in February", "Just Give Us an Order" and "Tiger in Mt. Paektu". 
					
					 The festival venue has been splendidly decorated by exquisite and marvelous ice sculptures including a large festive lantern, crystal bridge and crystal cave and peculiar lightings.

articles.title: Oratorical Meeting of Workers Held
articles.content:

articles.title: New Production Processes Start Operation at Tanchon Smeltery
articles.content:
New Production Processes Start Operation at Tanchon Smeltery
 Tanchon, February 12 (KCNA) -- Korean-style new production processes for glass fiber and plastic liquid went operational with due ceremony at the Tanchon Smeltery in South Hamgyong Province on Thursday. 
					 Leader Kim Jong Il visited the smeltery several times, giving important instructions to set up the production processes for glass fiber and plastic liquid that would contribute to building a thriving nation and improving the people's living standard.

					 Builders and officials and their helpers wound up in a short span of time the project equivalent to construction of a huge factory.   
					
					 Designers of the Nonferrous Metal Designing Institute, teachers at Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry and scientists at the Hamhung Branch of the State Academy of Sciences together with the technicians of the smeltery, settled in time sci-technological problems in designing and project and completed the synthetic plastic process of Korean style.

articles.title: Sangwon-trademarked Cement

articles.title: DPRK Official Condemns U.S. for Its Germ Warfare
articles.content:
DPRK Official Condemns U.S. for Its Germ Warfare
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The United States is a special-class criminal as it had waged the germ warfare during the 1950-1953 Korean War, while attempting to use A-bombs in the war.
					 Kim Hyok Hwan, section chief of the C.C., DPRK Red Cross Society, said this in an interview with KCNA.
					
					 The October 18, 1907, Hague Convention and other international conventions put a ban on the use of poisonous and other gases and bacteria in a war action, he noted, adding:
					
					 But, in the Korean War the U.S. used germ weapons in a planned and organized way in breach of international laws, and this fact had already been verified by various documents and testimonies of POWs.
					
					 According to a declassified document at the U.S. National Archives in March 2010, the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff gave on September 21, 1951, an order to start a large-scale spot test aimed to assess the effect of specific pathogen being used for germ warfare while under military operations.
					
					 Reporting about this fact, Al-Jazeera of Qatar, MBC of south Korea and other media around the world condemned the bestiality and brutality of the U.S imperialism.
					
					 International fact-finding teams, including a group of the International Association of Democratic Lawyers, visited the DPRK during the war to witness and confirm the atrocious germ warfare launched by the U.S. 
					
					 The germ warfare by the U.S. was unprecedented in terms of application means and method and viciousness, and it was aimed to exterminate the Korean nation from A to Z. 
					
					 It is the height of impudence for such criminal state to clamor about "danger of weapons of mass destruction."

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare Danger of U.S. Hegemony
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare Danger of U.S. Hegemony
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The U.S. deputy secretary of Defence in a recent lecture at the New America Security Center in Washington called upon NATO member nations to invest more funds in developing new type weapons to cope with "threats" of Russia and China.

					 Referring to major big powers' increase of military capabilities this time, the U.S. called for coping with this. This  clearly proves that its objective of beefing up its forces in the Asia-Pacific and various other parts of the world is designed to hold military hegemony in the international arena.
					
					 The U.S. undisguised disclosure of its real intention to contain Russia and China by force is a revelation of its extreme impatience and uneasiness about the fact that its hegemonic position is sinking and its ambition for world supremacy is ending in smoke.
					
					 The presence of the surrounding big powers is being steadily asserted while discontent and irritation at the change of the existing gradually enervating structure of international relations are heard from the U.S. 
					
					 The U.S. will make desperate efforts to bolster up military capability as it brought to light its attempt at military confrontation with Russia and China. Moscow and Beijing will do their best to protect their position, and stand-off of strength will further fester.

articles.title: Minju Joson Hits U.S.-South Korea Confabs against DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Hits U.S.-South Korea Confabs against DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Of late, the U.S. warmongers flew into south Korea on the heels of another and the south Korean puppets are kicking up a racket against the DPRK in league with their U.S. master.

					 The paper goes on:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet group are still clinging to confabs to stifle the DPRK, talking about "unstable social system" and "collapse", not giving up a stupid scenario. This is a tragicomedy to be recorded in the century.
					
					 "Washington supports the north-south dialogue" much touted by the U.S. is nothing but a hypocritical artifice to mislead the public opinion.
					
					 The U.S. scenario is to realize its wild ambition to invade the DPRK come what may.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the south Korean puppet regime is busy with a smear campaign against the DPRK, dancing to the tune of the U.S. 
					
					 The reckless moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are criminal acts of bedeviling the inter-Korean relations and mocking and insulting the Koreans' aspiration and desire for national reunification.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' frantic moves to escalate the confrontation with the compatriots, pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK, would only harden the will of its army and people to fight against the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces.
					
					  It is waste of time to sit at a negotiating table with those who deny the socialist system in the DPRK, pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy towards it. This is the conclusion drawn by the DPRK.
					
					 It will clearly show what a high price the south Korean authorities will have to pay for hurting the fellow countrymen in league with outside forces.

articles.title: Germ Warfare Waged by U.S. during Korean War (2)
articles.content:
Germ Warfare Waged by U.S. during Korean War (2)
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- It was an unprecedented inhuman crime that the U.S. used germ weapons during the 1950-1953 Korean War in flagrant violation of international laws and regulations.
					 In May 1951, the DPRK foreign minister sent the president of the UN General Assembly and the president of the UN Security Council a statement in protest against the U.S. use of germ weapons in the Korean War.
					
					 According to the statement, the U.S. imperialist forces spread smallpox in some areas of the northern half of Korea in December 1950, when retreating from those areas.
					
					 The number of smallpox cases drastically increased in 1951 in Pyongyang and South and North Phyongan, Kangwon, South Hamgyong and Hwanghae provinces, with 10 percent of them lost their lives.
					
					 The U.S. began to use germ weapons on a larger scale from early 1952.
					
					 On February 22, 1952, the DPRK foreign minister released a statement of protest against the U.S. forces' spread of pest and cholera germs throughout the DPRK's territory from January 28.
					
					 They dropped all sorts of poisonous insects like fly, mosquito, spider, bedbug and flea nearly 10 times in Kangwon Province in less than one month. Those insects were highly resistant to coldness and immune to insecticide.
					
					 The U.S. dropped a large quantity of foodstuffs, toys and daily necessities carrying cholera germ in Hwanghae, South Phyongan and Kangwon provinces.
					
					 From January 1953, even B-52s were involved in dropping epidemic carriers in most part of the northern half of Korea.
					
					 At least 20,000 poisonous insects were scattered on each square meter of Janghang-ri, Hyesan County, South Hamgyong Province.
					
					 The U.S. germ warfare was entirely aimed at exterminating the Korean nation.

articles.title: Unreasonable Dismissal of Workers under Fire by S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
Unreasonable Dismissal of Workers under Fire by S. Korean Paper
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- An editorial titled "Society where man is inferior to hamburger" was posted on Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea, on Feb. 9.
					 The editorial recalled that part-timers under the Service Trade Union launched an action against McDonald.
					
					 The part-timers in south Korea are leading a miserable life, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 The workers at McDonald call themselves "Mc slaves". This is because they are forced to do heavy labor for minimum wages. To make matters worse, unreasonable labor maltreatment is becoming commonplace. Workers are forced to work without a break.
					
					 Workers can hardly manage to buy a hamburger with the money they earn for an hour of hard work.

articles.title: Unreasonable Lay-off of Workers Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Unreasonable Lay-off of Workers Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Dismissed part-timers held a press conference in Jongro District, Seoul on Feb. 7 in protest against the unreasonable lay-off, according to website News 1 of south Korea.
					 At the press conference speakers accused companies of unreasonably dismissing part-timers under the pretext of the worsening business.
					
					 The part-time job and lay-off issue should be settled without fail, they held, urging the regime to opt for this.

articles.title: Japan-DPRK Friendship Meeting Held
articles.content:
Japan-DPRK Friendship Meeting Held
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A Japan-DPRK friendship meeting took place in Tokyo on Feb. 6 to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea; Shingo Kanemaru, political secretary for Sin Kanemaru who was vice-president of the Liberal Democratic Party of Japan; Dewi Sukarno, honorary chairperson of the Society for Disseminating and Supporting Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia; Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea; Genki Nakamura, chairman of the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange; Eiko Tomiyama, vice-president of the Central Executive Committee of the New Socialist Party of Japan; members of the Japan-DPRK friendship organizations and the Juche idea study organizations and media persons. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, and officials of the association. 
					
					 The chairman of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 They lauded Kim Jong Il for performing immortal feats before the country and people, the era and history with his outstanding idea and energetic Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 They noted that the Japanese prime minister denies the history of aggression, far from making a sincere reparation and apology for the past wrongdoings. They vowed to conduct the dynamic campaign to realize the normalization of the relations between Japan and the DPRK this year marking the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 They wished the army and the people of the DPRK successes in the work to bring about prosperity of Songun Korea under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. They hoped for the great advance in the inter-Korean relations by the united efforts of the Koreans.

articles.title: Headquarters Chairwomen of Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan Meet
articles.content:
Headquarters Chairwomen of Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan Meet
 Tokyo, February 11 (KNS-KCNA) -- A meeting of headquarters chairwomen of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan was held at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Feb. 6 and 7.
					 Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), called for working heart and soul to strengthen the movement of Korean women in Japan as required by the glorious Kim Jong Un's era, true to his ideology and intention.
					
					 Kang Chu Ryon, chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, underlined the need for the women's union to dynamically conduct the movement to greet the 60th anniversary of the formation of Chongryon with signal successes in the efforts to usher in a new heyday this year.
					
					 The women's union will orient all its work to the offensive to usher in a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan and to the drive to defend Chongryon organizations, she said.
					
					 She underlined the need for the women's union to strengthen itself and go deep among Korean women so that it may function as a body serving them.
					
					 She called for achieving signal successes in upholding and developing the education of children and national education to greet the 10th Congress of Mothers.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The meeting discussed this year's action plan.

articles.title: Korean Organization in Germany Criticizes U.S. "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK
articles.content:
Korean Organization in Germany Criticizes U.S. "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK 
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany posted on its internet homepage an article disclosing the injustice of the U.S. "human rights" racket against the DPRK. 
					 The article said the U.S. and its allied forces are now getting frantic with the "human rights" campaign against the DPRK. 
					
					 Citing examples to show how the DPRK ensures human rights, the article went on:
					
					 To be sure, the DPRK fully guarantees all rights for human beings at higher level than that in any other countries. 
					
					 The "human rights" campaign of the U.S. and its allied forces against this country is nothing but ridiculous and foolish one. 
					
					 The U.S. has pursued the hostile policy towards the DPRK such as political isolation, economic sanctions and military threats. When they do not work on the latter, the U.S. is going to make a new theatre for invading the DPRK with the "human rights issue" as a pretext for perpetrating an armed intervention.
					
					 World conscience resolutely rejects the unjust "human rights" campaign launched by the U.S. and its allied forces against the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Feats Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Feats Praised by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 There took place seminars on Feb. 5 and 6 at the Maritime Territorial Branch of the United Russia Party, three branch groups of the National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Ethiopia and the National University of Callao of Peru.
					
					 The deputy secretary of the Maritime Territorial Branch of the United Russia Party said that Kim Jong Il was an outstanding leader who defended the destiny of the DPRK and turned it into a military power with his Songun politics.
					
					 The DPRK today is possible as there was his leadership, the deputy secretary noted, adding:
					
					 The DPRK will turn into a thriving nation thanks to the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A branch chief of the National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Ethiopia said that the DPRK has dynamically advanced along the road of prosperity while foiling the moves of the U.S. It is the brilliant fruition of the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, the chief added. 
					
					 The chairman of the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for Study of the Juche Based Songun Policy and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il for defending the cause of socialism with his Songun politics.
					
					 They expressed full support and solidarity for the Korean people emerging victorious, holding high the banner of Songun under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Norway
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Norway
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Ostfold County, Norway on February 3.

articles.title: Statement of DPRK NDC Supported by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Statement of DPRK NDC Supported by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on February 4 in support of the statement of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC).

					 The U.S., rogue state, deserves punishment.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK released a joint statement on February 4 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.

					 Comrade Kim Jong Il was born as son of guerrillas, grew up in the severe anti-Japanese war and amid the dark clouds of the Fatherland Liberation War during which he cultivated firm faith and pluck to struggle against the imperialists to the end and the ardent patriotic spirit valuing even a blade of grass of the country.

					 He contained the U.S. and its followers which resorted to the frantic moves to isolate the DPRK and turned it into a military power with nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The Korean people have victoriously advanced along the road of independence, Songun and socialism which Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il hewed out, under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un retrata con los constructores de la Direccion de Constriccion 8
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un retrata con los constructores de la Direccion de Constriccion 8
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, retrato con los constructores de la Direccion de Construccion 8, quienes realizaron meritos laborales en la edificacion de las obras monumentales de la epoca del Songun.
					Salio al lugar de filmacion respondiendo a las efusivas aclamaciones de constructores y les dio caluroso saludo.
					
					Evaluo altamente como heroes de la epoca del Songun y tesoros del partido a los constructores de la Direccion de Construccion 8, quienes dedican todos sus esfuerzos abnegados por realizar el proyecto de construccion del partido y tomo una foto de recuerdo junto con ellos.
					
					Terminada la filmacion, el Mariscal dijo que si se registran innovaciones en la construccion, se fortalecera mas la base de un Estado prospero y se acondicionara mas el nido de la felicidad del pueblo y anadio que al ver la fisonomia de la patria cada dia mas renovada, nuestro pueblo guardara en el profundo de corazon el gran orgullo, la dignidad revolucionaria y el patriotismo.
					
					Subrayo que la nueva velocidad de construccion y el espiritu de la epoca que se crean en los campos de construccion, estimulan activamente a todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo a la lucha heroica por lograr proezas en la construccion de un Estado prospero y expreso su esperanza y conviccion de que en el futuro tambien los constructores cumplieran su responsabilidad y papel en la edificacion de las  obras encargadas.
					
					En la ocasion participaron el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Han Kwang Sang y los subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Yong Su y Ri Mun Gon.

articles.title: Publicadas consignas conjuntas del CC y CMC del PTC
articles.content:
Publicadas consignas conjuntas del CC y CMC del PTC
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 70o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria y de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea hicieron publicas las siguientes consignas conjuntas.
					   En su impetuoso avance para abrir la nueva era de la revolucion del Juche bajo la direccion del gran Partido, nuestro ejercito y pueblo van a acoger significativamente el septuagesimo aniversario de la liberacion de la patria y de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					   Al cabo de cuatro lustros del ensangrentado bregar contra el imperialismo japones el gran companero Kim Il Sung, eminente patriota y Sol de la nacion, logro la liberacion nacional y la causa de la fundacion del Partido, lo cual supuso un acontecimiento historico que produjo cambios radicales en el allanamiento del destino de nuestra patria y pueblo. 
					
					   El significativo 15 de agosto y 10 de octubre del 34 de la era Juche (1945) le permitieron a nuestro pueblo deshacerse del ignominioso yugo del apatrida colonial y poseer una genuina fuerza rectora capaz de encauzar su destino. A partir de entonces comenzo la historia de la Corea del Juche, un verdadero pais del pueblo que prospera sin cesar bajo la orientacion del Partido.
					
					   Los setenta anos de nuestro Partido y patria son una historia de grandes triunfos y brillante continuidad en la que se han logrado admirables exitos y transformaciones seculares bajo la orientacion de las eminentes figuras del monte Paektu. 
					
					   Durante un largo periodo el gran Lider Kim Il Sung y el gran Dirigente Kim Jong Il condujeron nuestra revolucion por el unico camino de la victoria, enarbolando la idea Juche, la Songun, y realizaron sempiternas hazanas dignas de ser escritas en los anales de la nacion. 
					
					   Su direccion fue la mayor fuente del contundente triunfo en la cruenta Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria contra el imperialismo norteamericano y de la plena exhibicion, generacion tras generacion y siglo tras siglo, del espiritu revolucionario del Paektu y de la firme fe en la victoria, asi como el factor decisivo de las proezas heroicas y sucesivos exitos portentosos en las dos restauraciones y construcciones, las dos fases de la revolucion social, la inaudita defensa de la Patria y la construccion de un Estado socialista poderoso y prospero. 
					
					   Por contar con los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il nuestro Partido se ha engrandecido como potente Estado Mayor politico y organizacion revolucionaria propiamente nuestra capaz de conducir siempre al triunfo el proceso revolucionario y constructivo en sus siete decenios de la historia, sin el minimo error o desvio en su lineamiento; nuestra patria se ha convertido en una potencia politica, ideologica y militar caracterizada por una inquebrantable unidad e invencibles fuerzas armadas; y nuestro pueblo se honra como una nacion heroica que como poseedora del indoblegable espiritu e inagotable creatividad supera con valor todas las pruebas de la historia y no deja de innovar y avanzar.
					
					   Imperecederos son los meritos de los grandes companeros quienes con extraordinarias ideas y teorias, grandiosa practica revolucionaria y noble patriotismo y entrega propiciaron el devenir de una era de prosperidad y florecimiento, sin precedentes en los cinco milenios de la historia nacional, colocaron en una altura superior la dignidad y posicion de nuestro Partido, patria y pueblo y asentaron una base duradera que asegura con firmeza el victorioso avance y porvenir de nuestra revolucion.
					
					   La historia y tradicion de sucesivos triunfos de nuestra revolucion continuan ininterrumpidamente gracias a otro gran hombre del monte Paektu, el companero Kim Jong Un.
					
					   Por contar con su acertada orientacion, la sagrada historia de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il continuan invariablemente, todos los militares y civiles se han aglutinado firmemente como tropas de la gran unidad que comparten con el Partido la misma idea, el mismo proposito y el mismo destino, y nuestra patria resplandece como potencia Paektusan que avanza impetuosamente hacia el luminoso futuro mediante el poderio de la ideologia, el fusil, las ciencias y la tecnologia.
					
					   Al evocar con emocion las siete decadas recorridas por nuestro Partido y patria, nuestro ejercito y pueblo sienten en carne propia el ilimitado honor y orgullo de continuar la tradicion de victoria enalteciendo a las eminentes figuras del monte Paektu y estan resueltos a lograr infaliblemente la sagrada empresa del Paektu, siguiendo la orientacion del gran companero Kim Jong Un. 
					
					   La actual ofensiva general para conmemorar el 70 aniversario de la liberacion de la patria y de la fundacion del Partido es una lucha enorgullecedora para hacer realidad el sueno y el ideal de nuestro pueblo con la fe, voluntad y disposicion revolucionarias puestas de manifiesto en el monte Paektu, asi como un gran avance de todo el pueblo encaminado a frustrar categoricamente todos los desafios de las fuerzas hostiles con el espiritu de ataque del Paektu y cantar el triunfo en todos los dominios de la construccion de un Estado socialista poderoso y prospero.
					
					   La victoria estara siempre de nuestra parte porque contamos con las valiosas hazanas revolucionarias que el gran Lider y el gran Dirigente realizaron mientras recorrian como pioneros el camino inexplorado de la revolucion del Juche, la del Songun, asi como con la destacada y probada orientacion del estimado companero Kim Jong Un, brillante heredero de la enorgullecedora tradicion de la victoria. 
					
					   El Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea convocan a todos sus miembros, militares y civiles a hacer de este ano significativo un ano de grandes triunfos y de grandes acontecimientos revolucionarios que seran registrados con letras mayusculas en la historia nacional, al librar una lucha perseverante con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, el espiritu del viento cortante del Paektu, como dignos descendientes del gran companero Kim Il Sung y soldados y discipulos del gran companero Kim Jong Il, y lanzan las siguientes consignas conjuntas en homenaje al septuagesimo aniversario de la liberacion de la patria y de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					   !Alcemonos todos en una ofensiva general para anticipar la victoria definitiva con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu!
					
					   !Acojamos con elevado fervor politico y brillantes exitos laborales el septuagesimo aniversario de la liberacion de la Patria y de la fundacion del Partido!
					
					   !Hagamos del septuagesimo aniversario de la liberacion de la Patria y de la fundacion del Partido un gran acontecimiento revolucionario que se registrara con letras mayusculas en la historia de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y de la Corea de Kim Jong Il!
					
					   Los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il son eternos lideres de nuestra revolucion, Sol del Juche y efigies de la prestigiosa potencia Paektusan.
					
					   !Enaltezcamos a los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il como eternos lideres de nuestro Partido y pueblo y como Sol del Juche!
					
					   !Los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il viven siempre en nosotros! 
					
					   !Conservemos para siempre el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan como supremo lugar sagrado del Juche y gran monumento de la eternidad del lider!
					
					   !Armemonos firmemente con la ideologia revolucionaria de los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il!
					
					   !Viva el gran kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo!
					
					   !Transformemos todo el Partido y toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo!
					
					   !Luchemos con teson, unidos monoliticamente con una misma alma y voluntad, como dignos descendientes del gran Lider y dignos soldados y discipulos del gran General!
					
					   !Mantengamos como vaso sanguineo los lazos de carino que nos unen al gran General!
					
					   !Hagamos perdurar para todas las generaciones la sagrada vida revolucionaria y las imperecederas hazanas de los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il! 
					
					   !Hagamos prevalecer para la posteridad la proeza realizada para la liberacion de la patria por el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung, redentor de la nacion y legendario heroe antijapones! 
					
					   !Viva la gran victoria en la guerra antijaponesa!
					
					   !Hagamos perdurar la idea y la proeza del gran Generalisimo Kim Jong Il para la revolucion del Songun! 
					
					   !Heredemos y desarrollemos brillantemente la gloriosa tradicion revolucionaria de nuestro Partido! 
					
					   !Llevemos a feliz termino la revolucion coreana con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, el del viento cortante del Paektu! 
					
					   Las lineas, orientaciones y ensenanzas de los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il son manuales de la revolucion.
					
					   !Materialicemos el legado del gran Lider y del gran General incondicional y consecuentemente, sin ninguna demora ni transigencia!
					
					   !Avancemos recto por el camino de la independencia, del Songun y del socialismo, indicado por los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il! 
					
					   !Levantemos en nuestro pais la mayor potencia del mundo y el paraiso del pueblo, segun el deseo del gran Lider y del gran General! 
					
					   !Todo a la manera de los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il! 
					
					   !Plasmemos el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il y aceleremos la construccion de una patria poderosa y prospera! 
					
					   !Dignifiquemos ante el mundo a la gran patria de Kim Il Sung, al gran pais del General Kim Jong Il, siguiendo al companero Kim Jong Un! 
					
					   !Continuemos firmemente la marcha del Paektu, en pos del estimado companero Kim Jong Un! 
					
					   La unidad monolitica es la tarea mas importante y el arma mas poderosa de nuestra revolucion. 
					
					   !Defendamos a costa de la vida el Comite Central del Partido encabezado por el gran companero Kim Jong Un! 
					
					   !Cuidemos como nina de los ojos y consolidemos mas firmemente la unidad monolitica del Partido y de las filas revolucionarias con el estimado companero  Kim Jong Un en su centro! 
					
					   !Que todos los militares y civiles levanten multiples fortificaciones en torno al estimado companero Kim Jong Un! 
					
					   !Viva el glorioso Partido del Trabajo de Corea, organizador y orientador de todas las victorias de nuestro pueblo! 
					
					   !Fortalezcamos el Partido del Trabajo de Corea como organizacion eternamente gloriosa de los companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il!
					
					   !Marquemos un nuevo jalon en la tarea de consolidar la capacidad orientadora y la combatividad del Partido en este ano del 70 aniversario de su fundacion! 
					
					   !Establezcamos mas firmemente el sistema de direccion unica del Partido en todas sus filas y en toda la sociedad! 
					
					   !Que todo el Partido piense, respire y camine al igual que su Comite Central!
					
					   !Implantemos en todo el Partido una ferrea disciplina capaz de movilizarlo como un solo cuerpo bajo la direccion unica del Comite Central!
					
					   !Mantengamos por todos los medios el prestigio del Comite Central del Partido materializando sus ideas y defendiendo su politica! 
					
					   !Hagan sus unidades y zonas como el patio del Comite Central donde se perciben con intensidad el llamado, la respiracion y el latido del Partido!
					
					   !Asuman como labor principal del Partido el cumplimiento de su linea y politica! 
					
					   !Servir al pueblo! 
					
					   !Observen estrictamente en el conjunto de las labores del Partido el principio de conceder prioridad a las masas populares!
					
					   !Que en todo el Partido se respire un aire de respeto, de amor y de apoyo al pueblo!
					
					   !Encaucemos principalmente las labores del Partido a mejorar la vida de la poblacion! 
					
					   !Que todas las organizaciones y funcionarios del Partido respondan con su lealtad a la gran confianza del pueblo!
					
					   !Que todo el Partido ponga gran empeno en el trabajo con el hombre!
					
					   !Doten a todos con una firme idea y conviccion, infundiendoles el amor y afecto del Partido madre! 
					
					   !Aunque uno sea malo 99% y bueno y honrado 1%, confienlo con audacia y denle la oportunidad de rehacer la vida!
					
					   !Asuman como labor fundamental del Partido y regla inviolable la movilizacion del espiritu de las masas!
					
					   !Que los funcionarios del Partido sean habiles transformadores del hombre y movilizadores de su espiritu que asimilan el metodo del Partido para el trabajo con las masas! 
					
					   !Superen resueltamente el abuso del poder y el burocratismo!
					
					   !Consideren el abastecimiento como una labor importante del Partido!
					
					   !Que las celulas del Partido cumplan su politica a toda costa y antes que nadie! 
					
					   !Anticipemos la victoria definitiva con una ofensiva ideologica revolucionaria!

					!Atengamonos mas a las leyes socialistas en la vida y establezcamos en toda la sociedad un ambiente revolucionario de observancia de la ley!
					
					!Todos, con el noble deber del ciudadano, observemos a conciencia las leyes del pais y el orden!
					
					!Que los organos judiciales y fiscales cumplan con su sagrada mision y deber de la defensa del Lider, la politica, el regimen y el pueblo!
					
					!Que intensifiquen la educacion en la observancia de la ley y la lucha juridica para garantizar legal y fidedignamente la construccion de un Estado poderoso y prospero!
					
					!Que los trabajadores juridicos sean temibles tigres para los elementos espurios y hostiles, y autenticos y fieles servidores para el pueblo!
					
					!Ejecuten las leyes correctamente y de acuerdo con el postulado de la politica del Partido para afianzar mas la unidad monolitica de las filas revolucionarias!
					
					!Apoyen en las masas para arreciar la lucha de clases!
					
					!Establezcan estrictamente la disciplina y el orden revolucionarios y guarden con rigor los secretos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito!
					
					Si los jovenes se animan, lo hace todo el pais y en todos los frentes de la construccion de un Estado socialista poderoso y prospero se registra un auge revolucionario.
					
					!Que los jovenes sean heroes en el digno empeno para honrar la gran era de 
					
					Kim Jong Un!
					
					!Que los jovenes sean vanguardias fieles sin limite a la causa revolucionaria del Songun del Partido!
					
					!Adelante siempre recto y en pos del Partido!
					
					!Que pongan de pleno manifiesto el heroico espiritu y el temple propios de la fidedigna vanguardia y flanco del Partido en la realizacion de la causa revolucionaria del Songun!
					
					!Hacia la trinchera de la primera avanzada de la revolucion del Songun entonando alto la cancion Tren hacia el frente!
					
					!Que sean Ri Su Bok y Jo Kun Sil de hoy que para la unica patria consagran sin titubeo tanto la juventud como la vida!
					
					!Contra viento y marea, en respuesta al llamamiento del Partido!
					
					!Dignifiquen su juventud como la generacion de sus padres!
					
					!Hagan de su organizacion juvenil una unidad poderosa caracterizada por una gran organizatividad, unidad y combatividad!
					
					!Eleven la combatividad de las organizaciones de trabajadores e inciten al maximo el entusiasmo patriotico de sus miembros!
					
					!Organicen y desarrollen activamente los movimientos masivos y hagan reinar en todo el pais la fiebre de la emulacion socialista!
					
					La marcha general de la nueva centuria del Juche exige un estilo de lucha y metodo de trabajo que permite dar grandes saltos mirando al mundo.
					
					!Creemos un nuevo espiritu de la era y la velocidad de Corea con el modo de  revolucion, el estilo de lucha y espiritu de creacion de nuestro Partido!
					
					!Corea cumple lo que se propone!
					
					!De un tiron!
					
					!Cumplamos la tarea asignada por el Partido en el tiempo definido por este y en el nivel que el exige!
					
					!Aprendamos del espiritu de lucha, el estilo de la ejecucion cabal de las tareas y la esmerada manera de trabajar de la unidad 267 del Ejercito Popular de Corea!
					
					!Que las unidades visitadas por los Lideres sean modelos y ejemplos en la materializacion de la politica del Partido!
					
					!Que la ciudad de Pyongyang, al crear su propio espiritu y velocidad, sea la primera del pais en todos los aspectos!
					
					!Preparen unidades modelos y produzcan innovaciones en todos los sectores!
					
					!Rompan esquemas y estereotipos e inventen lo nuevo constantemente!
					
					!Cubran de un aliento mil ries cuando otros den diez y cien pasos!
					
					!Miremos al mundo con los pies en nuestra tierra!
					
					!Apreciemos lo nuestro y hagamoslo mas grande!
					
					!Como en la Fabrica de Lubricantes Chonji materialicemos al pie de la letra la politica del Partido, en todos sus aspectos!
					
					Cuanto mas aficion tenemos al libro, tanto mas se acelera la prosperidad del pais y cuanto mas nos alejamos del libro, tanto mas demora el florecimiento de la nacion.
					
					!Establezcamos en toda la sociedad un ambiente de estudio al estilo de la guerrilla!
					
					!Superen completamente la manera de trabajar como los bomberos, con una pasion que no dura mas de cinco minutos y como si fuera una campana!
					
					!Compartidas con el estimado companero Kim Jong Un, tanto la alegria como la tristeza y las dificultades saben a la gloria!
					
					!Vivir no para hoy, sino para manana!
					
					!Tengamos el sublime criterio de la revolucion y el porvenir si sufrimos un ano, la patria progresara diez anos!
					
					!Hagamos que en todo el pais suene mas alto la cancion No envidiamos nada a nadie en el mundo!
					
					!Con la firme fe en la victoria y el optimismo, adelante hacia el esplendido porvenir!
					
					De los cuadros depende la ejecucion de la politica del Partido.
					
					!Sean abanderados y vanguardias en la ofensiva general de hoy!
					
					!Sean fervorosos partidarios e impecables ejecutores de la politica del Partido!
					
					!Vivamos y luchemos como los trabajadores de la decada de 1970 en que se preparaba la continuidad de la causa del Juche!
					
					!Organicen y dirijan las labores como en la guerra y dinamicamente como los miembros de mando del ejercito revolucionario!
					
					!Que activen la direccion y la labor politica en lugares de trabajo!
					
					!Programen, dirijan y hagan el balance de manera tridimensional y a una velocidad relampagueante!
					
					!Caminen y caminen hasta desgastarse la suela de los calzados, con la firme determinacion de resolver el problema de la vida de la poblacion aun consumiendose a si mismos!
					
					!Desarrollen cualquier labor de manera innovadora y cientifica!
					
					!Lean el pensamiento de la gente antes que la cifra de los productos!
					
					!El abastecimiento es como la defensa del socialismo!
					
					!Arrasen el derrotismo, el conservadurismo, el facilismo y el egocentrismo!
					
					Acabar con la tragedia de la division nacional de siete decenios es el anhelo de todos los compatriotas y la suprema y apremiante tarea de la nacion.
					
					!Levantemos a todo trance en esta tierra una potencia unificada, prestigiosa y prospera en acato al deseo de toda la vida de los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il!
					
					!Tomemos las tres cartas de la reunificacion del pais y las declaraciones Norte-Sur como carta y programa comunes de la nacion!
					
					!En este ano del 70 aniversario de la liberacion del pais abramos un ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente con la fuerza unida de toda la nacion!
					
					!Enarbolando la bandera de Entre nosotros, los connacionales, pongamos fin a la intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras y logremos la reunificacion independiente del pais!
					
					!Imprimamos un gran viraje y un gran cambio en las relaciones Norte-Sur en este ano del 15 aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio!
					
					!Levantemonos todos los compatriotas en fiel respuesta al llamamiento de la eminente figura a favor de la patria y la nacion y escribamos una nueva historia de las relaciones intercoreanas!
					
					!Frustremos resueltamente las provocaciones militares y los simulacros de guerra de los belicosos estadounidenses y surcoreanos!
					
					!Alcemonos todos en la lucha nacional para expulsar de Corea del Sur a las tropas  agresoras yanquis, causa del infortunio nacional y la guerra!
					
					!Despedacemos tajantemente las maquinaciones de Estados Unidos y sus seguidores de “derechos humanos contra nuestra Republica!
					
					!Mantengamos con firmeza los ideales de la politica exterior: la independencia, la paz y la amistad!
					
					!Mantengamos firmemente el principio revolucionario y la independencia en las relaciones exteriores!
					
					!Prioricemos la dignidad y los intereses de la nacion, ampliemos y desarrollemos multifacetica y activamente las relaciones exteriores!
					
					!Desarrollemos las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con todos los paises que respetan la soberania de nuestro pais y nos tratan amistosamente!
					
					Todos los miembros del partido, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular y otros sectores del pueblo:
					
					Ha resonado el canonazo de la impetuosa ofensiva general para acoger el septuagesimo aniversario de la liberacion de la patria y de la fundacion del Partido.
					
					El espiritu revolucionario, el de viento cortante, del Paektu y la advertencia de los precursores revolucionarios antijaponeses de no renunciar la conviccion de la revolucion aunque uno tuviera que morir, multiplican el victorioso espiritu y temple de nuestro ejercito y pueblo que, superando multiples dificultades, avanzan recto solo por el camino del Juche, y enardecen la lealtad y pasion de la columna en avance.
					
					Nadie puede detener el impetuoso avance de militares y civiles quienes, hombro con hombro y del brazo, avanzan con pasos firmes en pos del estimado companero Kim Jong Un, preeminencia del monte Paektu.
					
					Al frente de nuestras filas revolucionarias que no conocen mas que la victoria y la gloria, flamearan siempre las banderas que representan a los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il con sus sonrisas radiantes, estimulandonos y convocandonos a lograr nuevas victorias.
					
					!Todos adelante hacia la plaza para celebrar la victoria!
					
					!Viva el septuagesimo aniversario de la liberacion de la patria, gran victoria en la guerra antijaponesa!
					
					!Viva el septuagesimo aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea!
					
					
					
					Comite Central y Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea
					
					11 de febrero de 2015

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto de juramento en campamento secreto del monte Paektu
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto de juramento en campamento secreto del monte Paektu
Samjiyon, 12 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia de la Estrella Luz (16 de febrero, dia de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il), tuvo lugar el dia 12 en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu el acto de juramento para enaltecer generacion tras generacion al Dirigente como Sol del Juche y cumplir hasta el final la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					Participaron Kim Ki Nam, Hyon Yong Chol, Kwak Pom Gi, los vicepremieres Kim Yong Jin y Ri Chol Man, los funcionarios de las organizaciones del partido y las fuerzas armadas, las entidades de masas, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los benemeritos, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y trabajadores de diferentes estratos.
					
					　En la ocasion hubo discursos de juramento.
					
					Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, juro materializar incondicional y cabalmente la idea y el legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il enalteciendolo como eterno Secretario General del PTC. 
					
					Tomo la decision de seguir absolutamente al Mariscal, destino de la patria y bandera de la victoria eterna, con la conviccion revolucionaria y continuar la historia de camaraderia, la de unidad monolitica, iniciada en el monte Paektu. 
					
					El general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Hyon Yong Chol, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, subrayo que el EPC enaltecera para siempre al Dirigente como Sol del Songun y del Juche y defendera y glorificara para siempre sus inmortales hazanas realizadas por la construccion del ejercito tomando la casa natal del campamento secreto del monte Paektu como sosten espiritual.
					
					Prosiguio que el EPC, que tomo firmemente los fusiles de la revolucion y de clase entregados por el partido y la patria, exterminara a todos los enemigos cuando se de la orden y convertira los fuegos artificiales lanzados en el cielo del pico Jong Il en los de victoria final de la potencia del monte Paektu de Kim Jong Un.
					
					Jon Yong Nam, presidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, asevero que la juventud coreana, siendo continuadora de la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el monte Paektu, seguira enalteciendo como eterno lider al Dirigente, gran imagen de la potencia del monte Paektu, y glorificara para siempre su noble vida y hazanas revolucionarias.
					
					Luego se lanzaron fuegos artificiales en el cielo sobre el campamento secreto del monte Paektu. 
					
					Al verlos, los participantes redoblaron la determinacion de apoyar con fidelidad la causa revolucionaria del Juche con la conviccion revolucionaria tan firme y profunda como la cordillera Paektu.

Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores y carta de felicitacion de Cuerpo Diplomatico
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores y una carta de felicitacion que le dedicara el Cuerpo Diplomatico acreditado en Corea con motivo del dia de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					El embajador cubano en Corea, German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, los entrego este jueves al canciller coreano Ri Su Yong.
